work.title: Moog
work.description: Developing a test suite to serve user needs in order to communicate with the test hardware which performs random vibration testing on vehicles. The suite allows configuring the test hardware (tuning, calibration, etc.), processing real-time data from the test hardware (feedback signals), create and execute tests. Suite also involves allowing user to customize features pages/views based on the authorization level of the user. The features are developed as addin for plug-in architecture. It also required that the features could also be developed on different platform like Web, Winforms, Silverlight component but the flow shall be consistent thus the client side framework was made to be independent of Windows components and server side features were exposed as WCF services.
